com.dff.cordova.plugin.camera.helpers

Class CameraButtonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dff.cordova.plugin.camera.helpers.CameraButtonHelper

  • public class CameraButtonHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to manage button functionality. The Helper can rotate the buttons and change the icon based on the chosen function. Flash mode and camera mode can be checked and changed. Supported Flash modes are single flash, auto flash and no flash Camera modes are front or back camera

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraButtonHelper(R r, Log log, android.content.pm.PackageManager packageManager, CameraActivity cameraActivity, android.hardware.camera2.CameraManager cameraManager, CallbackContextHelper callbackContextHelper) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeCamera()
      The method changes between front and back camera.
      void changeFlashButton(android.hardware.camera2.CaptureRequest.Builder captureRequest)
      Changes the image of the button and set the flashMode in the captureRequest.
      void changeFlipButton(CameraState flipMode)
      Changes the icon of the button.
      void checkFlash()
      Hides the button when there is no flashMode.
      void checkFrontCamera()
      Hides the button when the device does not have a front camera.
      void enableAllButtons(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables all buttons.
      void initButtons()
      Initializes the imageButtons on the screen, sets their onClick event and checks if the device as a front camera and flashMode available.
      void rotate(float fromDegrees, float toDegree)
      Rotate all image buttons stored in the given list from a specific degree value to a specific degree value.

    • Method Detail

      • initButtons

        public void initButtons()
        Initializes the imageButtons on the screen, sets their onClick event and checks if the device as a front camera and flashMode available.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float fromDegrees,
                   float toDegree)
        Rotate all image buttons stored in the given list from a specific degree value to a specific degree value.
        Parameters:
        fromDegrees - - the start degree value
        toDegree - - the target degree value

      • changeFlashButton

        public void changeFlashButton(android.hardware.camera2.CaptureRequest.Builder captureRequest)
        Changes the image of the button and set the flashMode in the captureRequest.
        Parameters:
        captureRequest - package of settings to capture a image

      • changeFlipButton

        public void changeFlipButton(CameraState flipMode)
        Changes the icon of the button.
        Parameters:
        flipMode - state of the camera

      • enableAllButtons

        public void enableAllButtons(boolean enable)
        Enables or disables all buttons.
        Parameters:
        enable - true = enable, false = disable
